title: RIR effect on capital stock and currency value

content.question: With an increase in investment demand in the United States, the real interest rate rises. In this situation, the most likely change in the capital stock in the United States and in the international value of the dollar would be which of the following?

choices.label:
Capital Stock in United States
 International Value of the Dollar

Increase
 Decrease

Capital Stock in United States
 International Value of the Dollar

Increase
 No change

Capital Stock in United States
 International Value of the Dollar

Increase
 Increase

Capital Stock in United States
 International Value of the Dollar

Decrease
 Increase

Capital Stock in United States
 International Value of the Dollar

No change
 Decrease

content.answer:
Capital Stock in United States
 International Value of the Dollar

Increase
 Increase

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.4: Effect of Changes in Policies and Economic Conditions on the Foreign Exchange Market

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
